in_ports.name: table
in_ports.hint:
Translation table: each label is replaced with table[label] or table[label−1],
depending on "Indexing base of labels" parameter.

controls.caption: Indexing base of labels
controls.name: indexingBase
controls.description:
For every value V in the source matrix, the result value after translation will be equal to
table[V−B], where B = this indexing base.

controls.caption: Replacement for elements outside the table
controls.name: replacementForNotExisting
controls.description: If not specified, elements outside the table stay unchanged

controls.caption: Invert table
controls.name: invertTable
controls.description:
If set, the source table will be inverted before using for translation by "Invert table of indexes" function. In other words, we will replace every source value V not with table[V-B] (B=0/1 is the indexing base), but with INDEX of the value V inside the table.
Note: this mode requires "int" result element type (so, the table must contain integers). In other case, this function will throw an exception.
